widget.name: WinJS.UI.SemanticZoom
widget.description: Enables the user to zoom between two different views supplied by two child controls. One child control supplies the zoomed-out view and the other provides the zoomed-in view.

property.name: element
property.description: The DOM element that hosts the SemanticZoom control.

property.name: enableButton
property.description: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the semantic zoom button should be displayed or not

property.name: zoomedOut
property.description: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the zoomed out view is currently displayed.

property.name: zoomFactor
property.description: Gets or sets a value between 0.2 and 0.85 that specifies the scale of the zoomed out view. The default is 0.65.

property.name: locked
property.description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether SemanticZoom is locked and zooming between views is disabled.

property.name: zoomedInItem
property.description: Gets or sets a mapping function which can be used to change the item which is targeted on zoom in.

property.name: zoomedOutItem
property.description: Gets or sets a mapping function which can be used to change the item which is targeted on zoom out.
